message.body: Hey, are you around thus week at all?
I am! Wednesday I'm shooting most if the day but other than that I'm around
Cool. Want to meet on Tuesday?
Yeah that sounds great! What time is good for you?
I'm around all day. Maybe like a late afternoon beer?
That's prefect! Let me know if you need me to prepare anything!
(1/2) I haven't even started yet! My thought is that I'll ask you some background stuff when we meet up and then we'll do the interview over email so you can
(2/2) think things through and make sure you're saying what you want to say.
